Message: How could they say such things...?!

Granny only grew these flowers to
heal the pain in everyone’s hearts...

Feeling mortified and
powerless to defend myself,
I ran back home to the mountain.

“All they say to me is
‘Witch! Witch! Witch...!’

When Granny heard how
upset I was, she said to me,

“Their hearts have grown weary,
gripped with fear...
They can’t help but feel distressed.
They’re close to their breaking point.”

“So, they just chose poorly
in how to escape from it all...”

“It’ll be okay.
The day you get through
to them will come.
So, let’s send everyone flowers...”
“...and pray their hearts can be saved.”
